jetpack-related-posts.title: ¿Qué personaje de GOT es tu roomie perfecto?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: ¿Melissandre, Hodor, Jon Snow, o Tyron? ¡Adivínalo aquí! ¿Qué personaje de GOT es tu roomie perfecto? Created by Dada Room on May 17, 2016 Your item will be embedded here

jetpack-related-posts.title: Find Rooms For Rent In Mexico City
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: With Roomi's guide to Mexico City, you can learn all about what living in the city will be like. Find rooms for rent in Mexico City, and discover how you can get around with ease! Related: 15 Best Things To Do In Mexico City Getting to know Mexico City When…

img.alt_text: Birds eye view of Mexico city

jetpack-related-posts.title: Pecha Kucha Night Vol. 41
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Las PechaKucha Nights son eventos bimensuales donde personas creativas convergen para conocerse, hacer networking y presentar sus ideas usando el formato japonés de 20 imágenes por 20 segundos.En México, las PechaKucha Nights se han llevado a cabo desde el 2005 hasta el 2010. La Ciudad de México fue la cuarta ciudad en…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Roomi Rent Report October 2020: Average Room Prices
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: It’s that time of the month where we at Roomi sift through the data we have at our fingertips. Just so we can keep you updated on what’s happening in the USA’s rental market. We like a close eye on the price of renting a room in some major cities.…

img.alt_text: rental report by roomi for the month of october 2020

jetpack-related-posts.title: Roomi Rent Report: Average U.S. Room Prices in September 2020
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our exclusive data underlines rent prices for a room in these top 10 US cities. Take a closer look at the rental market with Roomi's rent report, Sept 2020.

img.alt_text: Roomi Rent Report: Average U.S. Room Prices in September 2020

jetpack-related-posts.title: Depas cerca de la línea azul del metro
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Vivir cerca de una estación del metro siempre es favorable en una ciudad tan grande como lo es la Ciudad de México. Desplazarse en el metro facilita el traslado, es más rápido, y más económico. La línea 2 del metro recorre prácticamente toda la ciudad; de Tasqueña a Cuatro Caminos,…
